title: Cold fish
description: It’s a streamlined and accessible drafting game to collect sets, I’m just not sure I find drafting games all that interesting personally.  Doesn’t feel very compelling turn to turn, or counting up arbitrary points at the end.  But if you want a cute, quick card drafting game that is the essence of card drafting, this is it.  And then go get sushi.

title: Great gate...
description: Great gateway game. Fun, quick, easily digestible. Highly recommended for newer gamers.

title: Great gate...
description: Great gateway game. Fun, quick, easily digestible. Highly recommended for newer gamers.

title: Cute cute ...
description: Cute cute cute. Great introduction to drafting and set collection. Gets a bit thin after a while, but OK to fill half an hour now and then.

title: Fast easy ...
description: Fast easy to teach, etc.  Doesn't have a soul though, so there isn't much here.  The cards are cute.  But it's basically go through the motions and arrive at a winner.

title: 2-4 player...
description: 2-4 players, 30 minutes, light, card draftingPlayed twice, was quite alright. Bought this since my family loves sushi

title: Fantastic ...
description: Fantastic party game.  Easy to learn and quick to play.  Always a hit!
